Blade of Law.description: You call upon the power of law and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed breaking or disrespecting the law or otherwise acting disorderly. The Strike deals two extra weapon damage dice if the target of your Strike is chaotic. Whether or not the target is chaotic, you can convert the physical damage from the attack into lawful damage.

Blade of the Crimson Oath.name: Blade of the Crimson Oath
Blade of the Crimson Oath.description: You call upon the Crimson Oath to smite undead and then make a weapon or unarmed Strike against an undead foe. The Strike deals two extra weapon damage dice, and you can convert all the physical damage from the attack into positive damage.

Blank Slate.name: 白紙
Blank Slate.description: 君の詐術は定命の者の最も強力な占術でさえも混乱させる。探知特性、暴露特性、念視特性の効果は、10レベル以上の無効化レベルを持たない限り、君、君の所有物、君のオーラの上を素通りして何も検知しない。たとえば、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{ディテクト・マジック}は範囲内の他の魔法は検知するが君を検知せず、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{トゥルー・シーイング}は君を明らかにせず、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LQzlKbYjZSMFQawP]{ロケート}や@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r784cIz17eWujtQj]{スクライング}は君を見つけられない、などである。

Blast Lock.name: Blast Lock
Blast Lock.description:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

Sometimes taking the shortest distance between two points involves removing an obstacle or two. You shoot your firearm at a lock within 10 feet. Make an attack roll against the DC required to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pick a Lock]{Pick the Lock}

Critical Success You open the lock, or you achieve two successes toward opening a complex lock.

Success You open the lock, or you achieve one success toward opening a complex lock.

Failure You fail to open the lock, and your shot makes it harder to open. Future attempts to Pick the Lock or Blast the Lock take a -2 circumstance penalty.

Critical Failure You fail to open the lock, and your shot makes it much harder to open. Future attempts to Pick the Lock or Blast the Lock take a -4 circumstance penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]

Blast Resistance.name: Blast Resistance
Blast Resistance.description:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You're used to the clamor of steel, the crack of a firearm, and the thunderous blast of explosions. You gain resistance 3 to sonic. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an auditory effect that causes the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] condition, you get a critical success instead.

Blast Tackle.name: Blast Tackle
Blast Tackle.description:
Requirements You're wielding a two-handed crossbow or a firearm that has the kickback or scatter trait.

You throw yourself at an enemy, bracing your weapon against it and pulling it close before releasing a destructive shot. Attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple]; if you're wielding your weapon in both hands, you Release one hand to do so. If your Grapple succeeds, you can immediately Strike the target of the Grapple with the required weapon, even if it's a two-handed weapon you're holding in one hand. This Strike deals an additional 3d6 precision damage. As long the creature remains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained], you can use just one hand to reload the weapon and Strike that creature with it.

Blasting Beams.name: Blasting Beams
Blasting Beams.description:
Requirements You have a free hand.

A directed beam of heat or an arc of lightning is one of the simplest ways to project energy. You fire a blast or beam from one hand. Make an @Check[type:deviant|defense:ac]{attack roll} against a creature within 30 feet. If you succeed, the beam deals @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2)d6)[@actor.flags.pf2e.deviantAbilities.dragon.damageType]]{1d6 damage} for every 2 levels you have to the target, or double damage on a critical success.

Awakening Your beams blast through targets. Instead of making an attack roll to damage a single creature within 30 feet, you can use Blasting Beams as a 2-action activity to damage all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:60], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save.

Awakening You can choose to launch smaller, quicker beams from your eyes instead. These deal [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2)d4)]]{d4s} instead of d6s, but the attack has the agile trait, and you don't need a hand free to make it, though your eyes must be uncovered.

Blaze Of Revelation.name: 続け放つ啓示
Blaze Of Revelation.description:
君の心と体は、短い間、君の呪いを過剰に引き寄せる惨状に耐えることができる。呪いに圧倒されそうになった時、君は1分間効果を抑え込むことができる。その間の君の各ターンでは、君は焦点化ポイントを消費したり更に不利な効果を受けることなく、自分の神秘から得た啓示呪文1つ（ただし領域呪文、《異種の神秘》で得た呪文、または他の能力から得たその他の啓示呪文は除く）を発動できる。

その1分間の終わりに、その時間が終わるまでに発動した啓示呪文の維持時間が終了し、呪いに圧倒されることによる通常の効果を受け、DC 40の頑健セーヴを試みなければならない。

大成功 君は他の効果を受けない。

成功 君は吸精状態2になり、次の日毎の準備が終わるまでこの状態を取り除くことはできない。

失敗 君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{吸精状態4}になり、次の日毎の準備が終わるまでこの状態を取り除くことはできない。

大失敗 君は死亡する。

@Check[type:fortitude|dc:40|showDC:all]

Blazing Aura.name: Blazing Aura
Blazing Aura.description:
Frequency once per day.

Trigger Your turn begins.

You explode in flame. Enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] take @Damage[7d6[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). Allies in the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] for 1 round and can use the additional action to Strike or Stride.

Blazing Streak.name: 灼走
Blazing Streak.description:
必要条件 君が《焚炎の構え》 を取っている。

2回“歩行”し、この移動中の任意の地点で、間合い内の異なるクリーチャー4体に対して“打撃”を1回ずつ行う。《灼走》の間に行われる燐明拳による“打撃”は、［斬撃］ダメージではなく［火炎］ダメージを与える。

Blazing Talon Surge.name: Blazing Talon Surge
Blazing Talon Surge.description:
Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}].

You rush forward and latch onto your enemy with talons of hungering fire.

Stride once. If you end your movement within reach of at least one enemy, you can make a fire talon Strike against that enemy that deals an additional @Damage[1d4[persistent,fire]] damage. If it hits and deals damage, you can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] the creature you hit.

Blazing Wave.name: Blazing Wave
Blazing Wave.description:
Flames flow out of you in a cascade, engulfing everyone in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -4)/2)+4)d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A creature that critically fails its save is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Bleeding Finisher.name: 出血の終撃
Bleeding Finisher.description:
君の一振りは大出血を引き起こす。精密打撃のダメージを加えられる武器あるいは素手攻撃を用いた、［斬撃］あるいは［刺突］の“打撃”を1回行う。命中したなら、目標は君の精密打撃の終撃へのダメージに等しい持続［出血］ダメージを追加で受ける。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]

Bless Shield.name: Bless Shield
Bless Shield.description: Your uttered prayers become an aegis, drawing the blessing of your deity across the surface of your shield. Until the beginning of your next turn your shield, any shield boss, or shield spikes gain the effects of a ghost touch property rune. Additionally, damage you take as a result of an incorporeal creature's Strike can trigger your Shield Block reaction, even if the damage isn't physical damage.

Bless Tonic.name: Bless Tonic
Bless Tonic.description:
You channel positive energy into restoratives that ward against harm. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] an alchemical item that restores Hit Points (rather than create it with advanced alchemy, Quick Alchemy, or another means), it becomes a blessed alchemical item and gains the positive trait. For example, an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Elixir of Life (Minor)]{Elixir of Life} would become a blessed elixir of life. When a creature regains Hit Points using a blessed alchemical item, the overflowing energy grants them negative resistance 5 for 1 round, or negative resistance 10 if you are legendary in Crafting.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]

Bless Toxin.name: Bless Toxin
Bless Toxin.description: You pour negative energy into toxins you create to further debilitate your targets. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] an alchemical poison (rather than create it with advanced alchemy, Quick Alchemy, or another means), it becomes a blessed alchemical poison and gains the negative trait. When a creature is afflicted with a blessed alchemical poison, for 1 round, any Hit Points it would regain from a positive effect are reduced by 5, or by 10 if you are legendary in Crafting.

Blessed Blood (Aasimar).name: 祝福された血 (アアシマール)
Blessed Blood (Aasimar).description:
君からこぼれたばかりの血は聖別され、それを摂取すると@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{ホーリィ・ウォーター}に似た効果が現れる。フィーンド、アンデッド、または［善］ダメージへの弱点を持つクリーチャーが君の血を飲んだり、顎や牙などの攻撃で［刺突］あるいは［斬撃］ダメージを与えたりしたなら、そのクリーチャーは1d6の［善］ダメージを受ける。君は自分の血を材料の1つとして使用する@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{ホーリィ・ウォーター}の“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{作成}”における〈製作〉判定に＋4の状況ボーナスを得る。

@Damage[1d6[good]]

Blessed Blood (Sorcerer).name: Blessed Blood (Sorcerer)
Blessed Blood (Sorcerer).description: Your deity's blessings manifest in your blood-borne power. Add up to three of your deity's spells (spells your deity grants to clerics) to your spell list. They are not automatically added to your repertoire, but you can select them just as you would spells normally on the divine spell list.

Blessed Denial.name: 祝福による否定
Blessed Denial.description:
アーキタイプ ブレスト・ワン

トリガー 30フィート以内にいる味方が@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{恐れ状態}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{吸精状態}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{虚弱状態}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{不調状態}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{知性低下状態}のいずれかになる。

君は落ち着いた心と守護の力を放ち、味方に降り注ぐ有害な状態を弱める。味方が受ける状態の状態値を1だけ減少させる（最低0）。同時に複数の状態を味方が受ける場合、軽減する1つを選択すること。

prerequisites.value: ブレスト・ワンへの専念

Blessed Medicine.name: Blessed Medicine
Blessed Medicine.description:
Trigger You fail a check to Treat a Disease that was inflicted by an undead (such as ghoul fever or mummy rot).

Your experience battling undead has uniquely prepared you to fight the diseases they inflict on the survivors, and you know that leaving these maladies untreated for long will eventually lead to more undead. Reroll the failed check and use the new result.

Blessed One Dedication.name: ブレスト・ワンへの専念
Blessed One Dedication.description:
アーキタイプ ブレスト・ワン

Y君は神格に触れられ他人の苦しみを緩和する能力を授けられた。君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{レイ・オン・ハンズ}祈祷呪文を得る。この焦点化呪文を発動するには1焦点化ポイントが必要である。この特技により、君は1焦点化ポイントを持つ焦点化プールと、焦点化プールを回復する“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再焦点化}”連続行動を得る。君は瞑想により“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再焦点化}”を行える。これは君に祝福を与えた神格を反映したものでもそうでなくてもよく、祝福が君の焦点化プールを回復してくれる。ブレスト・ワン・アーキタイプから得る祈祷呪文は信仰呪文である。

特殊 君はブレスト・ワン・アーキタイプから他の特技を2つ得るまで、別の専念特技を選択できない。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.SUDV5hFZ9WocxWqv]

Blessed Sacrifice.name: 祝福された犠牲
Blessed Sacrifice.description:
アーキタイプ ブレスト・ワン

君は祈祷呪文として@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rQYob0QMJ0I1U2sU]{プロテクターズ・サクリファイス}領域呪文を得る。君の焦点化プールの焦点化ポイントを1だけ増加する。

prerequisites.value: ブレスト・ワンへの専念

Blessed Spell.name: 呪文祝福化
Blessed Spell.description:
アーキタイプ ブレスト・ワン

頻度 10分に1回

君が味方への呪文に集中する際、君は有害な状態を取り除くことができる。次のアクションが呪文スロットからの“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{呪文発動}”で、その呪文が味方1体を目標にするものならば、君はその味方から有害な状態を1つ取り除こうと試みることができる。この状態は《慈悲》特技で取り除けるものでなければならない（これには《@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kZdcoaTD849QalR9]{上級慈悲}》などの《慈悲》を強化する特技の利益も含まれる）。呪文DCとレベルを基準に無効化判定を試みること。この効果は呪文の通常の効果に加えて適用される。

prerequisites.value: ブレスト・ワンへの専念
呪文スロットから呪文を発動する能力

Blessing of the Sun Gods.name: Blessing of the Sun Gods
Blessing of the Sun Gods.description:
The Old Sun Gods share their power with you. Select the ambition, cities, darkness, dreams, family, fire, freedom, healing, moon, passion, or sun domain. You gain an initial domain spell for that domain. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to pray to the Old Sun Gods; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Your Bright Lion focus spells are divine spells; you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability score.

Special You can select this feat multiple times, selecting a different domain each time and gaining its domain spell.

Blessings of the Five.name: Blessings of the Five
Blessings of the Five.description:
Frequency once per day

You call out to the Godclaw to heal your allies. You cast the 3-action version of heal, heightened to a level 1 lower than half your level rounded up. You can select up to four creatures in the area to remain unaffected by the spell. You can instead use this ability to bring a creature within 30 feet that has died within the last round back from the dead. If you do, the creature is restored to 1 Hit Point and is doomed 1 for 24 hours.

Blind-Fight.name: 無視界戦闘
Blind-Fight.description:
戦闘本能により、君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難状態}や不可視状態の相手により意識を向けるようになる。君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難状態}のクリーチャーを目標とするために、平目判定で成功する必要はなくなる。君は君から@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隠れた状態}のクリーチャーに対して@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{立ちすくみ状態}とならない。ただし、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隠れた状態}以外の理由で@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{立ちすくみ状態}であるなら、その効果は受ける。また、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隠れた状態}のクリーチャーを目標とする場合、DC 5の平目判定に成功するだけでよい。

自分のレベル以下の@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{未探知状態}のクリーチャーに隣接している間、そのクリーチャーは単に君から@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{隠れた状態}となる。

@Check[type:flat|dc:5]

Blood Component Substitution.name: 血液要素による代用
Blood Component Substitution.description: 君は自分の力直接エネルギーを引き出すことで、必要な詠唱や身振りを飛ばすことができる。そうすると君は自分の血の色で輝き、魔法のエネルギーでパチパチと音を立てる。君が“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{呪文発動}”する際、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{呪文発動}に必要な音声要素、動作要素、物質要素のすべてを血液要素に置き換えることができる。血液要素を使用するには、君は血中のエネルギーが枯渇することで呪文のレベルの2倍に等しいヒット・ポイントを失う。このヒット・ポイントの喪失はいかなる手段でも減少させることはできない。構成要素を変更する通常の手段と同様、これによって“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{呪文発動}”に必要なアクション数は変化せず、“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{呪文発動}”は精神集中の特性を得るが操作の特性を持たない。君は血脈構成要素を使用して呪文のコストの一部として必要な要素を置き換えることはできない。

Blood Frenzy.name: 血の狂乱
Blood Frenzy.description:
必要条件 君の幻獣の直前のアクションが生きているクリーチャーに［出血］ダメージを与える。

幻獣は狂乱へと至る。幻獣はブースト・アイドーロンの利益を得て、君のレベルに等しい一時的HPを得るがACに−2のペナルティを受ける。幻獣は自発的に狂乱を止められず、狂乱中に別の狂乱を開始することもできない。この狂乱は1分間持続し、その後幻獣は1分間@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲労状態}になり、1分間は狂乱を開始できない。

Blood in the Air.name: Blood in the Air
Blood in the Air.description:
Requirements An enemy you've damaged with a ranged weapon during the last minute is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] from you.

Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim. Make a ranged weapon Strike against the required target. This Strike ignores the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] condition and reduces the flat check for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] condition from 11 to 5.

Bloodletting Claws.name: 流血の爪
Bloodletting Claws.description:
君の幻獣は有効な一振りで出血する傷を与える。君の幻獣が［斬撃］あるいは［刺突］ダメージを与える近接素手攻撃による“打撃”でクリティカル・ヒットしたなら、目標は1d6の持続［出血］ダメージを受ける。君の幻獣はこの［出血］ダメージに、この素手攻撃の攻撃ロールへのアイテム・ボーナスに等しいアイテム・ボーナスを得る。これはクリティカル開眼効果である。

@Damage[1d6[bleed]]

Bloodletting Fangs.name: 流血の牙
Bloodletting Fangs.description:
君は犠牲者から血を吸い出すヴァンパイアの親の技術を模倣する。君の牙による“打撃”はクリティカル・ヒットにおいて追加で1d4の持続［出血］ダメージを与える。

@Damage[1d4[bleed]]

Bloodline Breadth.name: 血脈の広がり
Bloodline Breadth.description: 君のレパートリーは拡張され、毎日更に多くの血脈の体系に属する呪文を発動できる。最大のソーサラー呪文レベルより2レベル以上低い呪文レベルそれぞれについて、ソーサラー・アーキタイプ特技から得る呪文スロットを1つずつ増加させる。

prerequisites.value: ソーサラーの基本呪文発動

Bloodline Conduit.name: 血脈の導管
Bloodline Conduit.description:
使用回数 1分に1回

君の生まれつきの魔法の性質により、君は自分の呪文へ燃料を供給するために周囲のエネルギーを向けなおさせることができる。次のアクションが持続時間のない5レベル以下の呪文の“呪文発動”なら、君は“呪文発動”時に呪文スロットを消費しない。

Bloodline Focus.name: 血脈の焦点
Bloodline Focus.description:
君の焦点化プールは通常より速く回復する。前回“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]”してから少なくとも2焦点化ポイントを費やしているなら、君が“再焦点化”すると焦点化ポイントを1ポイントではなく2ポイントだけ回復する。

Remastered: “再焦点化”時、常に焦点化ポイントを全回復する。

Bloodline Metamorphosis.name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
Bloodline Metamorphosis.description: You have learned to manipulate the innate power of your bloodline and adapt it to your needs. When making your daily preparations, you can swap out a single spell of 9th level or lower for another spell of the same level. You can't swap out spells granted specifically by your bloodline.

Bloodline Mutation.name: 血脈変異
Bloodline Mutation.description:
君は血脈のクリーチャーにより近い存在へと変異する。君はこれらのクリーチャー種別に適切な特性を得る（異形の血脈なら異形、天界ならエンジェルとセレスチャル、サイコポンプならサイコポンプと監視者など）。その特性のクリーチャーにとって適切なものであれば、君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.DRtaqOHXTRtGRIUT]{夜目}あるいは暗視を得る。以下から1つを選択すること。

血脈に対応するクリーチャーが飛行能力を持つなら、君は地上移動速度に等しい飛行速度を得る。

血脈に対応するクリーチャーが水棲あるいは水陸両生なら、君は水陸両生となり、水中と地上で呼吸できるようになり、地上移動速度に等しい水泳速度を得る。

血脈に対応するクリーチャーが［強酸］、［氷雪］、［雷撃］、［火炎］、［負のエネルギー］、［音波］のいずれかの抵抗あるいは完全耐性を持つなら、血脈が完全耐性あるいは抵抗を持つエネルギー種別を1つ選び、そのエネルギー種別に対する抵抗20を得る。

prerequisites.value: 特定のクリーチャー種別に基づく血脈

Bloodline Perfection.name: 血脈の完成
Bloodline Perfection.description: 君の血脈と体系の究極の力を取り仕切る。君は追加の10レベル呪文スロットを1つ得る。

Bloodline Resistance.name: 血脈の抵抗
Bloodline Resistance.description: 君の魔法の血は魔法に対する抵抗を高めてくれる。君は呪文や魔法の効果に対するセーヴィング・スローに＋1のステータスボーナスを得る。

Bloodline Wellspring.name: 血脈の源泉
Bloodline Wellspring.description: 君の血の力は君の焦点化を補充する。最後に“再焦点化”してから少なくとも3焦点化ポイントを使用しているなら、君が“再焦点化”したときに回復する焦点化ポイントは1ポイントではなく3ポイントとなる。

Bloody Blows.name: 流血の一振り
Bloody Blows.description:
君の致命的な素手攻撃は、肉をえぐって血まみれにするか、激しい内出血を引き起こすかする。非致傷でない素手攻撃を用いた“打撃”クリティカル・ヒットすると、目標は1d4の持続［出血］ダメージを受ける。これは君が拳で致傷攻撃をするためにペナルティを受けているか、《@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JP5pptkl1Fx1JK4m]{鉄拳}》や《牙》や類似の能力によって、非致傷特性を持たない素手攻撃を持っているかのいずれかのときである。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.M5195FvfCN3X7gi9]

@Damage[1d4[bleed]]

Bloody Debilitation.name: 出血の衰弱
Bloody Debilitation.description:
君の攻撃は動脈と静脈を切り刻む。君が@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{衰弱化打撃}を使用する際の選択肢に、次の衰弱を追加する。

衰弱 目標は3d6の持続［出血］ダメージを受ける。

@Damage[3d6[bleed]]

Boaster's Challenge.name: Boaster's Challenge
Boaster's Challenge.description: You call out a foe, causing them to become flustered and easier to defeat. Select one creature you can see and declare a challenge. For your challenge, attempt a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check against that creature's Will DC. Your challenge must include a linguistic, auditory, or visual component and gains the corresponding trait. If you succeed, you gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with your weapon or unarmed Strikes against that foe until the end of your next turn; if you have master proficiency in the skill you used, you gain a +4 status bonus instead, and if you're legendary, you gain a +6 status bonus. On a critical success, the status bonus lasts for 3 rounds instead. Whether you succeed or fail, creatures who witnessed your challenge gain a +4 circumstance bonus to their Will DCs against your attempts to challenge for 1 minute.

Body of Air.name: Body of Air
Body of Air.description:
Trigger An enemy you can observe targets you with an attack or other damaging effect (Only required for reaction)

Your gathered air consumes your body, leaving only a cloud of living vapor. This has the same effects on you as vapor form. The effect lasts until the end of your next turn, but you can Sustain the form up to 5 minutes. If you activate your kinetic aura, Body of Air ends.

You can use Body of Air as a reaction only when the trigger is met, but you can use it as a 2-action activity without the trigger being met.

Level (+1) The resistance increases by 1.

Bodysnatcher.name: Bodysnatcher
Bodysnatcher.description: Your secret-stealing maggots reveal how to devour more than just the flesh and secrets of a victim; you can ingest and assume their whole physical appearance. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1If9lLVoZdO8woVg]{Consume Flesh}] of a creature of your size or smaller, you can assume the physical form of the creature immediately after becoming satiated or fully satiated. Using Bodysnatcher counts as creating a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception. Your transformation automatically defeats Perception DCs to determine you are a member of the ancestry or creature type into which you transformed, and you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your Deception DC to prevent others from seeing through your disguise. You do not gain the special abilities, skills, voice, memories, or other characteristics of the creature you consumed, only their physical form. Unlike Change Shape, Bodysnatcher can be used to gain the appearance of a specific individual whose flesh you've consumed. This effect lasts until you are no longer satiated and can only be used once per individual creature.

Bolera's Interrogation.name: Bolera's Interrogation
Bolera's Interrogation.description:
Frequency Three times per day

You focus your attention on a single creature within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a Will save against your Perception DC. On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. On a critical failure, the penalty to Deception checks is -4. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (failure)]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Bolera's Interrogation (Critical Failure)]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.bmVwaN0C4e9fE2Sz]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.VIScVb6Hl7KwoWfH]

Bolster Soul Cage.name: Bolster Soul Cage
Bolster Soul Cage.description:
Your constant efforts to augment and perfect your soul cage have bolstered its efficiency. Your soul cage has Hardness equal to your level and HP equal to four times your level. The time it takes your soul cage to rebuild your body is reduced to [[/r 1d6 #Days to Rebuild Body]]{1d6 days} rather than 1d10 days.

At 20th level, the time it takes your soul cage to rebuild your body is reduced to [[/r 2d12+12 #Hours to Rebuild Body]] hours.

Bon Mot.name: 名文句
Bon Mot.description:
君は敵の気を逸らすために洞察に富んだ皮肉を浴びせる。30フィート以内にいる敵1体を選び、目標の意志DCに対して〈交渉〉判定をロールする。

大成功 目標は注意をそらし、1分の間、知覚と意志セーヴに－3のステータスペナルティを受ける。目標は君の《名文句》に言い返すことでこの効果を通常より早く終了させることができる。これは精神集中特性を持つ単一アクションか、その反論を表す適切な技能アクションである。GMがどの技能アクションが適切かを判断するが、最低でも1アクションを要するものでなければならない。一般に、反論には言語の【魅力】基準の技能アクションを使用する必要がある。

成功 大成功と同様だが、ペナルティは－2。

大失敗 君の皮肉は酷いものだ。君は成功したら敵に与えていたものと同じペナルティを受ける。これは1分が経過するか、君がもう一度《名文句》を行って成功するかするまで続く。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.CtrZFI3RV0yPNzTv]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.GoSls6SKCFmSoDxT]

Bond Conservation.name: 絆の維持
Bond Conservation.description:
必要条件 君の使用した直前のアクションが“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{絆のアイテムからの消費}”だった。

君が消費した、絆のアイテムに貯められていた秘術エネルギーを注意深く扱うことで、君は別の少し弱い呪文を発動できるだけのエネルギーを残しておくことができる。次に行うアクションが“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{絆のアイテムからの消費}”のエネルギーを使用した“呪文発動”なら、君は“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{絆のアイテムからの消費}”の使用回数を追加で1回得る。君はこの“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{絆のアイテムからの消費}”の追加の使用回数を、次のターンの終わりまでに使用しなければならず、そうしなければこの使用回数は失われる。また、この追加の使用回数は、最初に“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.v82XtjAVN4ffgVVR]{絆のアイテムからの消費}”を用いて発動した呪文よりも2レベル以上低い呪文にしか使用できない。

Bonded Animal.name: 動物との絆
Bonded Animal.description:
君は動物との強いつながりを結ぶ。通常の（相棒などの特別でない）動物とのつながりを試みるために7日間の余暇を費やす。その後、DC 20の〈自然〉判定に成功すると君は動物との絆を築ける。君がこの絆を壊すような酷いことをしない限り、動物は永続的に協力的状態になる。協力的状態な動物は技能の章「動物に命令する」で説明されているように、命令するのが容易になる。

新しい動物と絆を築くと、ほかの動物との間に築かれていた絆は終了する。

絆のある動物と動物の相棒を同時に持つことはできない（絆のある動物と使い魔を同時に持つことは可能）。

@Check[type:nature|dc:20]

Bonded Focus.name: 絆の焦点
Bonded Focus.description:
君と絆のアイテムとのつながりにより、焦点化プールが増加する。

君が直前に“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]”してから2焦点化ポイント以上消費しており、君の絆のアイテムを所持しているなら、君は“再焦点化”時に焦点化ポイントを1ポイントではなく2ポイント回復する。

Remastered: “再焦点化” 時、焦点化ポイントを全回復する。

Bonds of Death.name: Bonds of Death
Bonds of Death.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animate Dead] this turn.

You sway with the motions of your spells that animate the dead, channeling your power to sustain two at the same time. You Sustain your previous casting of animate dead, binding the necromantic energy of the two spells together with metaphysical twine. On subsequent rounds, you can Sustain both animate dead spells with a single action to Sustain the Spell. This benefit lasts until either of the spells ends.

Bone Caller.name: Bone Caller
Bone Caller.description: Using a mixture of dinosaur bones and the bones of your ancestors to focus your magic, you animate lizards and dinosaurs to carry messages or serve as mounts. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Messenger] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Phantom Steed] as primal innate spells once per day each. The animal messenger is always a Tiny dinosaur or lizard, and your innate spell transforms it from bones to flesh, even if there are no dinosaurs or lizards nearby. The phantom steed looks like a dinosaur rather than a horse but functions identically.

Bone Investiture.name: Bone Investiture
Bone Investiture.description: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dinosaur Form] on yourself as a 5th-level primal innate spell once per day.

Bone Magic.name: Bone Magic
Bone Magic.description: Your connection to your iruxi ancestors manifests as a simple primal spell that you cast using a fragment of an ancestor's bones. Choose one cantrip from the primal spell list. You can cast this cantrip as a primal innate spell at will, and it's heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Bone Missile.name: Bone Missile
Bone Missile.description: You can remove your ribs to use them as arrows or bolts. When you draw a rib, you lose [[/r 2]]{2 HP }, and the projectile deals 2 extra negative damage if you Strike with it before the end of your next turn. The HP loss and extra damage both increase to [[/r 3]]{3} at 12th level and [[/r 4]]{4} at 19th level. Your rib cage magically replenishes, and any rib you draw crumbles to dust after being used for a Strike or at the end of your next turn, whichever comes first.

Bone Rider.name: Bone Rider
Bone Rider.description: Using your ancestors' bones, you manifest their spirits around you in a fossilized form, terrifying your foes. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mask of Terror] on yourself as a primal innate spell once per day. When you do, you appear as a skeletal lizardfolk ancestor, twisted in a way that inspires the deepest fears of those who observe you.

Bone Spikes.name: Bone Spikes
Bone Spikes.description:
Sharp shards of bone tear forth from your elbows, wrists, or other parts of your body. For 1 minute, you can make bone spike unarmed Strikes, which deal 1d6 piercing damage and have the versatile S and sweep traits. When you take the Bone Spikes action, you can choose one weapon on your person and duplicate its weapon runes onto your bone spikes (with the exception of any runes that couldn't apply to the bone spears).

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Bone Spikes]

Awakening Your bones grow longer, lashing flexibly at range. While you have bone spikes, you can Interact to give your bone spikes reach 10 feet until the end of the current turn.

Awakening Grooves in your bone spikes form a channel for venom. Your bone spikes deal 1d4 persistent poison damage, which increases to 2d4 at 10th level and 3d4 at 18th level.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.ZsO5juyylVoxUkXh]

Bone Swarm.name: Bone Swarm
Bone Swarm.description:
Frequency once per day

You scatter your body and transform into a whirling storm of bones for up to 1 minute or until you spend a single action to return to your normal shape. You become Huge, gain the swarm trait, and gain a fly Speed of 40 feet. As a swarm, you have the following characteristics.

  • You are immune to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] conditions.
  • You have weakness 5 to area and splash damage.
  • You can occupy the same space as other creatures and must do so to use your damaging ability.
  • As a 2-action activity, you can deal @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures sharing your space (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
  • You can't speak, Cast Spells, use manipulate actions requiring your hands, Activate magic items, or make any Strikes with your normal body.
  • You don't gain the swarm mind ability, so you are still affected normally by mental effects. You also retain the benefits of skeleton feats that don't require communication or the use of hands.

Boneyard's Call.name: ボーンヤードの呼びかけ
Boneyard's Call.description:
#divlcass

君はボーンヤードとその裁判所と強力なつながりを持ち、ボーンヤードとの間を行き来することができる。君は信仰生得呪文として@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{プレイン・シフト}を得る。君はこの呪文を週に2回発動できる。君はこれをボーンヤードへの移動あるいははボーンヤードから物質界への移動にのみ使用できる。ボーンヤードと君との間にある独自の接続により、君の体が焦点具となり、音叉を必要としない。

Boost Modulation.name: Boost Modulation
Boost Modulation.description: You aren't satisfied with keeping to just one kind of boost from your constant tinkering, so you've learned to modulate between several possibilities at once. Choose two additional offensive boosts. You can use an Interact action to change the offensive boost currently affecting your weapon, choosing between the one you chose for the class feature and the two you chose for this modification. If your weapon has the modular trait, you can swap the offensive boost as part of the Interact action you take to use that trait.

Boost Summons.name: 増強召喚術
Boost Summons.description: 幻獣への強化は君が招来するクリーチャーにも適用される。君がブースト・アイドーロンを発動する際、君の幻獣に加えて60フィート以内にいる君が招来したクリーチャーも目標にする。

Borrow Memories.name: Borrow Memories
Borrow Memories.description:
Knowing how someone thinks makes it much easier to know where they'll be, or even replace them altogether. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind Probe] as an innate occult spell once per day, using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

If you cast mind probe on a target you're studying for the purpose of Assuming their Role, and the target fails their save, you can delay the spell from coming into effect until you Assume their Role. When you use the spell this way, you can Sustain it up to 10 times during its duration, asking a question each time. The spell lasts until you ask all 10 questions or are no longer Assuming the Role, whichever comes first. You don't need to Sustain the Spell to extend its duration-only when asking a question-nor do you need to be in range or have line of effect to Sustain it.

Borrow Time.name: Borrow Time
Borrow Time.description:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger Your turn begins.

You reach ahead and make use of time that's yet to be. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] and can use the extra action to Step, Stride, or Strike. You gain this extra action immediately and can use it this turn. At the end of your turn, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

Boulder Roll.name: 巨石転がり
Boulder Roll.description:
ドワーフの体つきは、まるで地下の洞窟を巨大な岩が転がり落ちるように、敵を押しのけることができる。君は自分のサイズ以下の敵のマスに“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{ステップ}”し、敵はその後ろの空いているマスに移動しなければならない。例え敵がこの移動で害を受ける場合でも、敵は移動しなければならない。敵は君の“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{ステップ}”を妨害するために、君の〈運動〉DCに対して頑健セーヴィング・スローを試みなければならない。敵がこのセーヴィング・スローを試みた場合、大成功をしない限り、その敵は君のレベル＋【筋力】修正値に等しい［殴打］ダメージを受ける。

敵が何もないマスに移動できない場合（たとえば、固体の物体や他のクリーチャーに囲まれている場合など）、《巨石転がり》は効果を発揮しない。

@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(10+@actor.system.skills.ath.value)]

[[/r (@actor.level)+(@actor.abilities.str.mod)]]

Bounce Back.name: 活力復元
Bounce Back.description:
頻度 1日1回

トリガー 君の@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{瀕死状態}状態が除去された。

君は死にかけた状況から驚異的な回復力で蘇る。君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{瀕死状態}から回復したことで@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{重傷状態}値を増加させない。

Bouncy Goblin.name: Bouncy Goblin
Bouncy Goblin.description: You have a particular elasticity that makes it easy for you to bounce and squish. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Acrobatics (or another skill of your choice, if you were already trained in Acrobatics). You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to Tumble Through a foe's space.

Bound in Ice.name: Bound in Ice
Bound in Ice.description:
You become a hybrid of your ancestry and a saumen kar. Your size increases to Large, and your reach becomes 10 feet. Your cold resistance increases to be equal to your level, and you gain fire resistance equal to half your level.

You also gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.a47Npi5XHXo47y49]{Blizzard Evasion}] reaction.

Boundless Reprisals.name: 無限の応報
Boundless Reprisals.description: 君は戦闘の流れを見極める第六感を持ち、どんな状況にも必要に応じて素早く対応できる。各敵のターンの開始時、君はそのターンの間にのみ使用できる、ファイター特技あるいはファイターのクラス特徴にのみ使用できるリアクションを1つ得る。

Bounty Hunter Dedication.name: バウンティ・ハンターへの専念
Bounty Hunter Dedication.description:
アーキタイプ バウンティ・ハンター

君が獲物を探すことに集中すると、君は何も見落とさない。君は“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{獲物狙い}”アクションを得る。君は自分が見たことのあるクリーチャー、その噂を聞いたことがあるクリーチャー、賞金首の掲示や張り紙といったその他の方法で知ったクリーチャー1体のみを指定できる。“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{獲物狙い}”の他の利益に加えて、君は獲物に関する“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{情報収集}”に＋2の状況ボーナスを得る。

君が既に“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{獲物狙い}”を有しているなら、君は〈生存〉の熟練になり、獲物に対する“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.plBGdZhqq5JBl1D8]{情報収集}”への状況ボーナスを得る。上記の内容に加え、君は依然として探索中に追跡していたクリーチャーを指定できる。

特殊 君はバウンティ・ハンター・アーキタイプから別の特技を2つ得るまで、他の専念特技を選択できない。

Brain Drain.name: Brain Drain
Brain Drain.description:
With a wresting of will, you siphon off a creature's mental energy to replenish your own. One non-mindless creature within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.spellDC.value)] save against your spell DC.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute, and you regain 1 Focus Point, up to your normal maximum. You can't use Brain Drain again until after the next time you make your daily preparations.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}.

Brains!.name: Brains!
Brains!.description:
Trigger You Feast upon a humanoid's brain. The humanoid can't be mindless (or, if you're Feasting on a corpse, can't have been mindless while alive).

You consume the brains of your foe, causing synapses long rotten to fire and enabling you to shake off your mental torpor. You gain a +1 status bonus on skill checks to Recall Knowledge for 1 hour. If the humanoid had a higher modifier to the skill check you're using to Recall Knowledge than you do, the status bonus increases to +2.

Bravo's Determination.name: Bravo's Determination
Bravo's Determination.description:
Trigger A foe's Strike reduces you to 0 Hit Points; you were not at 1 Hit Point and you would not be killed.

Your confidence borders on self-delusion, but it keeps you going against overwhelming odds. Attempt a Deception check against the attack DC of the triggering Strike. You take a penalty to this check equal to twice your wounded value, if any. If the triggering attack was a critical hit, use the result one degree of success worse than what you rolled.

Critical Success You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point.

Success You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point, but you increase your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] value by 1.

Brawling Focus.name: 剛腕への集中
Brawling Focus.description: 君は白兵戦で、攻撃を最大限に活用する方法を知っている。剛腕種に属する素手攻撃と剛腕種に属する武器によるクリティカル開眼効果を使用できるようになる。君が《修道士の武器》を持つなら、君は同時に習熟している全てのモンク武器のクリティカル開眼効果を使用できるようになる。

Breached Defenses.name: Breached Defenses
Breached Defenses.description:
You can find the one weak point in a creature's scales, wards, or armor to get past its resistances. When you succeed at Exploit Vulnerability, you learn about the highest of the creature's resistances that can be bypassed (for example, if the creature has resistance to physical damage except silver), if the creature has one. If you prefer, you can choose the following benefit instead of one of the usual two benefits from Exploit Vulnerability.

Breached Defenses You can choose this benefit only if you succeeded at Exploit Vulnerability and learned the creature has at least one resistance that can be bypassed. Choose one such resistance. Your unarmed and weapon Strikes bypass the chosen resistance.

Breath Control.name: 呼吸制御
Breath Control.description: 君には驚異的な呼吸制御機能があり、大気が危険であったり希薄な時に有利に働く。窒息し始める前に、通常の25倍の時間だけ息を止められる。吸入型の毒など、吸入型の脅威に対するセーヴィング・スローに＋1の状況ボーナスを得、そのセーヴに成功した場合は大成功になる。

Breath Like Honey.name: Breath Like Honey
Breath Like Honey.description: You smell of honey and savory things. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enthrall] as a 3rd-level occult innate spell once per day, except the spell has a range of 30 feet and the inhaled trait instead of the auditory trait. Targets don't gain any circumstance bonus for disagreeing with you. Your circumstance bonus to checks to Make an Impression if the target can smell your breath increases to +2.

Breath of Calamity.name: Breath of Calamity
Breath of Calamity.description: Your roar shakes the earth and splits the heavens. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chain Lightning] as a 7th-level innate occult spell. Any creature that critically fails its save against the spell is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 round.

Breath of Hungry Death.name: Breath of Hungry Death
Breath of Hungry Death.description:
Frequency Once per hour

You have uncovered occult mysteries that allow you to unleash the devastating hunger of Kabriri upon your foes with a single exhalation, releasing a massive cloud of flesh-eating gas that glows with a sickly green light. You deal @Damage[7d6[acid],7d6[void]]{7d6 acid and 7d6 negative damage} to all creatures within a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] save with a DC equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). A creature that gets a critical failure on this Reflex save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] for 1 round. A creature that succeeds at this save becomes temporarily immune to Breath of Hungry Death for 24 hours.

When a creature is killed using Breath of Hungry Death, its body is reduced to a smoldering pile of ash wafting with necrotic fumes. You can use a reaction to immediately inhale these fumes and become satiated or fully satiated as if you had used Consume Flesh.

Breath Of The Dragon.name: 竜の吐息
Breath Of The Dragon.description:
アーキタイプ ドラゴン・ディサイプル

君は君が模倣する竜のように、強力なブレス攻撃を使用できるようになる。君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JcobNl4iE9HmMYtE]{ドラゴン・ブレス}のソーサラーの血脈呪文と、1焦点化ポイントを持つ焦点化プールを得る。君が既に焦点化プールを持つ場合、焦点化ポイントの総数は1だけ増加する。

prerequisites.value: ドラゴン・ディサイプルへの専念

Briar Battler.name: Briar Battler
Briar Battler.description: You've learned to use roots, crevices, uneven ground, and dense underbrush to your advantage. When you're in difficult terrain from an environmental feature, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Take Cover], even if the feature wouldn't ordinarily be large enough for you to Take Cover.

Bright Lion Dedication.name: Bright Lion Dedication
Bright Lion Dedication.description:
Access @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Item.JfGVkZkaoz2lnmov]{Bright Lion}] background

You become trained in your choice of Deception or Diplomacy and in Mzali Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You incorporate enough worship of Walkena in your daily life to avoid suspicion. You typically don't need to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Lie] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Impersonate] to pass yourself off as a worshipper of Walkena. Against careful inspection, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks specifically to pass yourself off as a version of yourself faithful to Walkena.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.vS9iMDapZN9uW33Q]{@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.backgrounds.Item.JfGVkZkaoz2lnmov]{Bright Lion}} archetype.

Brightness Seeker.name: Brightness Seeker
Brightness Seeker.description: Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes studying your surroundings in search of omens related to a particular course of action to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Augury] as an innate divine spell. Unless the result of the augury was "nothing," you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.mk6rzaAzsBBRGJnh]{Call Upon the Brightness}] reaction for the next 30 minutes.

Brightsoul.name: Brightsoul
Brightsoul.description: The fire inside you asserts itself as beaming, radiant light. Your body is naturally luminescent, glowing with the effects of a primal @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light] cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up. The light is involuntary and constant; if counteracted, it returns in [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. You suffer a -2 circumstance penalty on Stealth checks to Hide or Sneak and gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saves against light effects and effects that inflict the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] conditions.

Brilliant Crafter.name: Brilliant Crafter
Brilliant Crafter.description: Your skill at crafting is unparalleled. You become an expert in Crafting. At 7th level you become a master in Crafting, and at 15th level, you become legendary in Crafting and you become an expert in your inventor class DC.

Brine May.name: ブライン・メイ
Brine May.description: 君の母はシー・ハグだ。君は母から緑か青という海の色の目を与えた。君は海にも岸に安らぎを見出す。君が“水泳”への〈運動〉判定に成功すると、代わりに大成功を得る。そのラウンドの“水泳”アクションで成功せずに水の中でターンを終了した場合でも、君は溺れない（流れによって動かされる可能性はある）。

Brinesoul.name: Brinesoul
Brinesoul.description: Your elemental ancestor's legacy asserts itself as brackish water, like the seawater of the ocean. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.b6CanpXyUKJgxEwq]{Salt Wound}] reaction.

Bristle.name: Bristle
Bristle.description:
You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance to AC until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Bristle]

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills}] reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.4Zj71naHbY6O9ggP]

Broadside Buckos.name: Broadside Buckos
Broadside Buckos.description: Shimali Manux trains every Salt Breaker to fight in the cramped quarters below deck, and you've learned how to use these techniques with your crew. During your daily preparations, you can name up to five crewmates you will be working with that day. If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your crewmates, that enemy is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against you.

Brutal Beating.name: 凶暴打撃
Brutal Beating.description: 君の暴力的なクリティカル・ヒットは、敵の自信を揺るがす。君の“打撃”がクリティカル・ヒットしてダメージを与えるたび、目標は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{恐れ状態1}となる。

Brutal Bully.name: 粗暴な暴漢
Brutal Bully.description:
君は周囲の敵を押しのけて傷を残す。激怒中、君が“武器落とし”、“組みつき”、“突き飛ばし”、“足払い”を敵1体に成功させたなら、君はその敵に君の【筋力】修正値に等しい［殴打］ダメージを与える。このダメージは、“足払い”における大成功によるダメージに追加される。

[[/r @actor.abilties.str.mod[bludgeoning]]]

Brutal Critical.name: 粗暴なるクリティカル
Brutal Critical.description: 君のクリティカル・ヒットは極めては快適だ。近接攻撃のクリティカル・ヒットにおいて、君はダメージ・ダイスを1つ追加する。武器が致命的特性あるいは深手特性を保つ場合、君はそれらに加えてこの追加ダイスを得る。加えて、目標はダメージ・ダイス2つに等しい持続［出血］ダメージを受ける。

Brutal Finish.name: 終わりの猛打
Brutal Finish.description:
必要条件 君が近接武器1つを2つの手で装備している。

君の最後の一振りは、敵の防御に弾かれたとしても衝撃を与える。必要条件を満たす武器で“打撃”を1回行う。その“打撃”の後、君のターンは終了する。この“打撃”は追加の武器ダメージ・ダイス1つを与える。君が18レベル以上なら、追加の武器ダメージ・ダイスは2つとなる。加えて、この“打撃”は以下の失敗効果を得る。

失敗 君は必要条件を満たす武器の武器ダメージ・ダイス1つに等しいダメージを与える。君が18レベル以上なら、このダメージは武器ダメージ・ダイス2つに増加する。

Brutish Shove.name: 豪快な突き飛ばし
Brutish Shove.description:
必要条件 君は両手近接武器を装備している。

体重を載せて攻撃することで、君は敵がよろめくほどの衝撃を与える。両手近接武器で“打撃”を1回行う。サイズが自分と同じか自分より小さい目標に命中したなら、そのクリーチャーは現在の君のターンの終了時まで@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{立ちすくみ状態}となり、君は自動的にその敵に“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{突き飛ばし}”を行い、“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{突き飛ばし}”アクションと同じ利益を得る（“打撃”がクリティカル・ヒットなら、大成功の効果も得る）。君は目標について移動し、この移動はリアクションのトリガーにならない。

この“打撃”は以下の失敗効果を得る。

失敗 目標は君の現在のターンの終了時まで@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{立ちすくみ状態}となる。

Buckler Dance.name: バックラーの舞い
Buckler Dance.description:
必要条件 君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{バックラー}を装備している。

君は攻撃のたびに@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{バックラー}を防御に適した形で回す。この構えを取っている間、君は必要条件を満たしている限り“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{盾を掲げる}”をしているかのように@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{バックラー}を常に掲げている。

Buckler Expertise.name: バックラー熟練
Buckler Expertise.description: 君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{バックラー}をより防御力を高めるために配置する柔軟な方法を学んだ。君が@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{盾を掲げる}で@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{バックラー}からACに状況ボーナスを得るとき、そのボーナスを+1から+2に増やす。

Built-In Tools.name: Built-In Tools
Built-In Tools.description: You've built tools into your innovation so you can access and use them easily. When you take this feat, choose up to two sets of tools you own, such as thieves' tools or healer's tools, that weigh a total of 2 Bulk or less. These tools become part of your innovation. The innovation's Bulk doesn't increase from this addition. As long as you are wielding, wearing, or adjacent to your innovation, you have the same quick access to these tools as the tools you are wearing, and they don't count against the usual limit of tools you can wear.

Bullet Dancer Burn.name: Bullet Dancer Burn
Bullet Dancer Burn.description:
Requirements You're wielding a firearm with an attached bayonet or reinforced stock.

The fiery blaze of your weapons combined with your unorthodox technique leaves your opponents with little opportunity to capitalize on any gaps in your defenses, or properly defend themselves against your onslaught. While in Bullet Dancer Stance, when you successfully Strike an opponent with a bayonet or reinforced stock attached to your firearm, the next ranged Strike you make against that opponent doesn't trigger reactions that would trigger on a ranged attack, such as Attack of Opportunity. While in Bullet Dancer Stance, when you make a successful ranged Strike against an opponent within your melee reach using a firearm, the next reinforced stock or bayonet attack attached to that firearm deals an additional @Damage[1[fire]] damage per weapon damage die. The benefit on your next Strike from either use of Bullet Dancer Burn is lost if not used by the end of your next turn.

Bullet Dancer Dedication.name: Bullet Dancer Dedication
Bullet Dancer Dedication.description:
You've learned how to synchronize traditional martial arts and guns. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}] action. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you gain that new proficiency with bayonets, reinforced stocks, simple firearms and unarmed attacks.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.5nd8ON2kFGOsCdwQ]{Bullet Dancer} dedication archetype.

Bullet Dancer Reload.name: Bullet Dancer Reload
Bullet Dancer Reload.description:
Requirements You're in Bullet Dancer Stance.

You've learned to reload your simple firearms with uncanny grace, the ammunition simply falling into place as though part of a well-practiced kata. You Strike with a simple firearm, and then Interact to reload that same firearm. You don't need a free hand to reload your simple firearm in this way.

Bullet Split.name: Bullet Split
Bullet Split.description:
Requirements You're wielding a firearm or crossbow in one hand and a slashing (or versatile S) melee weapon in the other.

You carefully align your weapon with the edge of your blade, splitting the projectile in two as you fire to attack two different targets. Make two Strikes, one each against two separate targets. The targets must be adjacent to each other and within your weapon's maximum range. Each of these attacks takes a -2 penalty to the attack roll, but the two count as only one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Bullseye.name: 百発百中
Bullseye.description: 君は敵の遮蔽や援護を避けるため、慎重に狙いを定めてから攻撃する。君のターンの終了までに行われた次の遠隔武器“打撃”次のストライクにおいて、君は攻撃ロールに＋1の状況ボーナスを得るとともに、目標の@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難状態}および下級遮蔽と標準の遮蔽を無視する。ターゲットが上級遮蔽を得ていた場合、代わりに君の“打撃”に対する標準の遮蔽のみを得る。

Bullying Staff.name: Bullying Staff
Bullying Staff.description:
Requirements You are wielding your staff.

You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] creatures up to two sizes larger than you. If you have master proficiency with your staff, you can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to three sizes larger than you.

Burn It!.name: 燃やせ！
Burn It!.description:
炎は君を魅了する。［火炎］ダメージを与える君の呪文と錬金術アイテムは、呪文レベルの半分またはアイテム・レベルの1／4に等しいステータスボーナスを得る（最小1）。また、君が与える永続的な［火炎］ダメージに対して＋1のステータスボーナスを得る。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]

Burning Jet.name: Burning Jet
Burning Jet.description:
A condensed burst of flame shoots behind you, propelling you forward with its sheer force. Stride up to 40 feet in a straight line. Movement from this impulse ignores difficult terrain and doesn't trigger reactions.

Level (6th) The maximum distance of the Stride is 60 feet. You can choose to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] up to 40 feet in any direction instead of Striding. If you're in the air at the end of this Leap, you fall normally.

Level (10th) As 6th level, but you hover briefly after leaping into the air. If you Leap, you don't fall until the end of your next turn. If you use Burning Jet again on a subsequent turn, you remain airborne.

Burning Spell.name: 呪文燃焼化
Burning Spell.description:
君は火の元素で呪文を強化し、目標に着火する。君の行う次のアクションが目標1体にダメージを与える呪文の“呪文発動”のために使用されたなら、この呪文は他の効果に加えて呪文レベルに等しい持続［火炎］ダメージを与える。呪文が元々持続［火炎］ダメージを与える場合、何の効果ももたらさない。この呪文は火炎の特性を得る。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]

prerequisites.value: エレメンタリストへの専念
君の元素特性が火である

Burrow Elocutionist.name: 穴掘り弁士
Burrow Elocutionist.description: 君は地中に住むクリーチャーの鳴き声を固有の言語として理解する。君はバジャー（アナグマ）、グラウンド・スクィール（ジリス）、モール（モグラ）、プレーリー・ドッグといった、穴掘り速度を持つ動物に質問したり、答えを受け取ったり、〈交渉〉技能を使用したりすることができる。どの動物にこの能力を適用できるかはGMが決定する。

Burrowing Form.name: 穴掘り個体
Burrowing Form.description: 君の幻獣は泥濘を穴を掘って進むことができる。君の幻獣は穴掘り速度15フィートを得る。

Butterfly Blade Dedication.name: Butterfly Blade Dedication
Butterfly Blade Dedication.description:
Access Defeat a member of the Butterfly Blades in a sanctioned bout.

You become trained in Deception and Stealth; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with butterfly swords. You gain access to butterfly swords.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.vKuJVojicBmNsL1C]{Butterfly Blade} archetype.

Butterfly's Kiss.name: Butterfly's Kiss
Butterfly's Kiss.description: You can make nonlethal Strikes with a butterfly sword without taking a penalty.

Butterfly's Sting.name: Butterfly's Sting
Butterfly's Sting.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Sneak Attack] class feature. You don't increase the number of dice as you gain levels.

Cackle.name: 魔女笑い
Cackle.description: 君は一瞬笑って見せることで呪文1つを延長できる。君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YVK3JUkPVzHIeGXQ]{カックル}呪術を修得する。君の焦点化プールの焦点化ポイントを1だけ増加する。

Cadence Call.name: 合いの手
Cadence Call.description:
アーキタイプ マーシャル

頻度 1分に1回

君は素早く拍子をとり、味方がより効率的にリズムに乗れるように導く。君のマーシャルのオーラ内にいる同意する味方はそれぞれ、次の君のターンの終了時まで@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{加速状態}になる。彼らはこの追加アクションで“歩行”のみを行える。各味方のターンの終了時、もしその味方が追加アクションを使用していたならその味方はその次のターンの終了時まで@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{減速状態1}になる。

Calaca's Showstopper.name: Calaca's Showstopper
Calaca's Showstopper.description:
Frequency once per day

You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels. You dramatically unleash a stunning blast of sound by smashing an instrument you hold or belting out a discordant note. This has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Synaptic Pulse], but the effect is auditory rather than mental. The DC is either your @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]{class or spell DC }, whichever is higher.

Calcifying Sand.name: Calcifying Sand
Calcifying Sand.description:
Trigger A creature damages you with an attack using an unarmed attack or a non-reach melee weapon.

Your flesh gives way as you're struck, becoming coarse sand that can magically turn your enemy to stone. You gain resistance equal to your level to physical damage from the triggering attack. The attacking creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)] save against your class DC. Regardless of the result, that creature can't trigger Calcifying Sand again for 1 hour.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Petrified] until the end of its next turn.

Calculated Splash.name: 算出された飛散
Calculated Splash.description: 君は爆弾の飛散を最大化するためにあらゆる角度を計算した。飛散特性を持つ錬金術爆弾を投擲する際、君は爆弾が通常のダメージではなく、君の【知力】修正値（最低0）に等しい飛散ダメージを与えるようにすることができる。

Call And Response.name: 掛け合い
Call And Response.description: 君の奏演は掛け合い曲の様式をとり、君がいなくてもその効果を味方に与え続ける。君の次のアクションが持続時間が1ラウンドの奏演キャントリップの発動のために使用されたなら、それはcallとなる。その公文mが効果を発揮している間、呪文の効果を受けている味方1体は聴覚と精神集中の特性を持つ単一アクションとして君の呼びかけに応じるすることで、呪文の持続時間を1ラウンド引き伸ばすことができる。味方1体だけが呼びかけに応じることができ、その味方の呼びかけへの応答は追加の効果を持たない。

Call Bonded Item.name: 絆のアイテム招来
Call Bonded Item.description: 君は絆のアイテムと奇妙なつながりを持ち、手にそのアイテムを呼び出すことができる。絆のアイテムが1バルク以下なら、君はその絆のアイテムを君の手に瞬間移動させる。ただし、1マイル以内に存在していなければならない。

Call Gun.name: Call Gun
Call Gun.description: You build a powerful magical connection with a chosen gun or crossbow, gaining the ability to conjure it directly to your hand from any distant location. During your daily preparations, choose a single crossbow or firearm. Until your next daily preparations, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ESMIHOOahLQoqxW1]{Call Gun}] action to call the gun to your hand.

Call Implement.name: Call Implement
Call Implement.description:
Requirements You have a free hand.

You can tug on the bonds of ownership between yourself and your implement, causing it to find its way back to you. You look down and find that your implement has mysteriously appeared in your free hand, as long as the implement was within 1 mile and on the same plane of existence. If your implement is attended by another creature, that creature can prevent the implement from teleporting away if it succeeds at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.thaumaturge.value)] save against your class DC. If the creature succeeds, you can't attempt to Call that Implement again; you must track the creature down to get the implement back.

Call of Elysium.name: Call of Elysium
Call of Elysium.description:
The wild wonder of Elysium harmonizes within you, and in dire straits, you can share its benefits with your allies.

Your Speed increases by 5 feet; the Speed increase from this feat isn't cumulative with any Speed increase from your ancestry feats (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nimble Elf]).

Allies who begin their turn in combat adjacent to you gain a +5-foot status bonus to their Speed for the round.

Call Of The Green Man.name: Call Of The Green Man
Call Of The Green Man.description: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Plant Form] as a 5th-level primal innate spell. When you reach 17th level, this spell can be heightened to 6th level.

Call of the Wild.name: 自然の呼び声
Call of the Wild.description: 君は自然のクリーチャーに助けに来るよう呼びかける。君は自然界との調和に10分を費やすことで、ドルイド呪文スロットに準備している呪文1つを、同じレベルの@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4YnON9JHYqtLzccu]{サモン・アニマル}もしくは@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jSRAyd57kd4WZ4yE]{サモン・プラント・オア・ファンガス}に置き換えることができる。

Call the Hurricane.name: Call the Hurricane
Call the Hurricane.description:
Massive waves spiral around you, with you as the eye of the hurricane. The waves appear in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], or a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] if you're in a body of water. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -8)/2)+6)d8[bludgeoning]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC. A creature that fails its save is battered by the waves and pushed 10 feet (or 20 feet on a critical failure).

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d8.

Call The Worm.name: Call The Worm
Call The Worm.description: You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal], heightened to 9th level, as an innate primal spell that you can cast once per day, but can only summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Purple Worm]. At 20th level, you can summon an elite purple worm instead.

Call Ursine Ally.name: Call Ursine Ally
Call Ursine Ally.description:
Frequency once per hour

You can cast a 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Animal] as an innate spell, but only to summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.Black Bear]. At 10th level, the summon animal spell is heightened to 4th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Grizzly Bear]. At 12th level, your summon animal innate spell is heightened to 5th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.Actor.Polar Bear]. At 14th level, it's heightened to 6th level, and you can summon a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.Cave Bear].

Call Worm Spirit.name: Call Worm Spirit
Call Worm Spirit.description:
Frequency once per day

You call forth a ghostly manifestation of the worm spirit. Choose an intersection on the ground within 60 feet; the ghostly maw of a worm emerges from the ground, attacking all creatures in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10]. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes @Damage[(1d10+13)[bludgeoning]] damage as it is battered by the worm's body.

Failure The target takes @Damage[(3d10+15)[piercing]] damage as it is bitten by the worm. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the damage increases to @Damage[(6d10+30)[bludgeoning]] and the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. The button above uses the better of your class or spell DC.

Call Your Shot.name: 犠牲者指定
Call Your Shot.description:
アーキタイプ グラディエーター

《沸き立つ観客》に成功したとき、選択できる利益の一覧に以下を追加する。

  • 30フィート以内にいて君を見ることのできるクリーチャー1体を選択し、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{恐れ状態1}にする。この効果は感情、恐怖、視覚、精神の特性を持つ。

Called Shot.name: Called Shot
Called Shot.description:
You target a specific area of your foe's anatomy to debilitating effect. Declare a part of your foe's anatomy to target and make a ranged weapon Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target takes one of the following effects, based on the body part you targeted. The GM should use the stated effects as a guideline when attacking creatures with stranger anatomy-for instance, applying the “arms” effect to a creature's tentacles if those are what the creature uses to attack.

  • Arms The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute.
  • Head The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.
  • Legs The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of your next turn. On a critical hit, it also takes a -5-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute.
  • Wings If the target is flying using its wings, it immediately falls 20 feet, or 40 feet on a critical hit. The fall is gradual enough that if the target hits the ground, it takes no damage from the fall.

Called.name: 呼びかけを受けたもの
Called.description: 君は「呼びかけ」を聞いた。その執拗な要求に常に抵抗することで、自分の心を狙う効果に対する精神的な防壁を身につけた。君は精神効果に対する意志セーヴィング・スローに＋1の状況ボーナスを得る。君が精神効果に対するセーヴィング・スローに成功すると、代わりに大成功を得る。

Callow May.name: キャロウ・メイ
Callow May.description: 君は最も一般的なチェンジリングの一つ（グリーン・ハグから生まれたもの）であり、鮮やかな緑色の目はその親子関係を意味する。母親が持つ人を操る性質と多彩な声は、他人を欺く際に有利に働く。君は《@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{すてきな嘘つき}》技能特技を得る。もしイニシアチブ判定で〈ペテン〉をロールしたならと、まだ行動していない戦闘中の敵は君に対して@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{立ちすくみ状態}になる。

Calm and Centered.name: Calm and Centered
Calm and Centered.description: Your occult connection to the world helps you deal with being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]. When your frightened or stupefied condition values would decrease, decrease the value by 2.

Camouflage.name: 迷彩
Camouflage.description: 君は外見を変えて自然に溶け込む。自然の地形において、君は遮蔽がなく@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{視認困難状態}を与えていなくても“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{隠れ身}”や“@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{忍び歩き}”を行える。

Cannibalize Magic.name: Cannibalize Magic
Cannibalize Magic.description:
The fey magic inside of you is a vital part of your body, and you can steal other sources of magic to replenish yours. You can draw power from your magical equipment to replenish your health. You drain one of your invested items, in the process regaining Hit Points equal to double the item's level. In addition, you can attempt a counteract check with a total bonus equal to 10 + the drained item's level against one effect that gave you the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] condition. If you succeed, you reduce the chosen condition's value by 1. An item drained by this action becomes non-magical until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Special This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.).

Cannon Corner Shot.name: Cannon Corner Shot
Cannon Corner Shot.description: By loading special ammunition in a particular way, you can make your siege weapons do all manner of tricks that other siege engineers can barely even imagine. If you personally contribute an additional Load action to the siege weapon's loading, above the minimum, you can change a burst into a line twice as long as the size of the burst, or vice versa (so a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] turns into a @Template[type:line|distance:20], or a @Template[type:line|distance:20] turns into a @Template[type:burst|distance:10]).

Canny Acumen.name: 用心深き眼識
Canny Acumen.description: 君の回避力や観察力は、職能からも考えられぬほど優れている。頑健セーヴ、反応セーヴ、意志セーヴ、知覚のいずれかを選択する。君が選択したものへの習熟が熟練になる。17レベルの時点で、その習熟は達人になる。

Canopy Sight.name: Canopy Sight
Canopy Sight.description: You can see equally well even in dense jungles where only a small amount of light shines through. You gain low-light vision.

Can't Fall Here.name: Can't Fall Here
Can't Fall Here.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger An adjacent and willing ally would be reduced to 0 HP but not killed.

You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds. Your ally doesn't fall unconscious and remains at 1 Hit Point. The ally also gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 1 minute. Fighting onward with such an injury isn't without consequence; your ally's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] condition increases by 1.

Can't You See?.name: Can't You See?
Can't You See?.description: The eye rebels, the mind recoils-no matter how much those who can see you try to explain what's there, their friends' gazes just skitter over you, like a bird afraid to land. A character who attempts to Point Out your location must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:14]. If they fail, their allies misunderstand them and aren't sure where you are. On a critical failure, their allies think they pointed you out in a different location entirely, chosen by the GM. Similarly, when a creature critically fails to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] you while you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] to or undetected by it, it thinks you're in a different location chosen by the GM. In either case, you appear to be hidden to a creature that thinks you're in a different location, though you're actually undetected by it for targeting and further uses of the Seek action.

Cantorian Reinforcement.name: Cantorian Reinforcement
Cantorian Reinforcement.description: The life energy that helped create the first hobgoblins is particularly potent in you, protecting you from ongoing maladies. When you succeed at a saving throw against a disease or poison, you reduce the stage by 2 (or 1 for a virulent disease or poison), and when you critically succeed, you reduce the stage by 3 (or 2 for a virulent disease or poison).

Cantorian Rejuvenation.name: Cantorian Rejuvenation
Cantorian Rejuvenation.description:
Frequency once per day

The life-giving energy that flows in your blood revitalizes you. You recover [[/r 4d6[healing]]]{4d6 Hit Points} and gain 10 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute. When you reach 15th level, you instead recover [[/r 6d6[healing]]]{6d6 Hit Points} and gain 15 temporary HP.

Cantorian Restoration.name: Cantorian Restoration
Cantorian Restoration.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger A living creature within 60 feet would die.

The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times. The triggering creature receives the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Breath of Life], except they recover a number of Hit Points equal to [[/r (6d8+@actor.abilities.con.mod)[healing]]]{6d8 plus your Constitution modifier}.

Cantrip Casting.name: キャントリップ発動
Cantrip Casting.description: 君は単純な呪文を発動する能力を増加させる。君は自分の特性に対応する体系からキャントリップを追加で2つ得る。

Cantrip Expansion (Magus).name: キャントリップ追加 (メイガス)
Cantrip Expansion (Magus).description: 熱心な学習を通して、君は簡単な呪文をより幅広く準備できる。毎日、君はキャントリップを追加で2つ準備できる。

Cantrip Expansion (Prepared Caster).name: キャントリップ追加 (準備型術者)
Cantrip Expansion (Prepared Caster).description: 熱心な学習を通して、君は簡単な呪文をより幅広く準備できる。毎日、君はキャントリップを追加で2つ準備できる。

Cantrip Expansion (Spontaneous Caster).name: キャントリップ追加 (任意発動型術者)
Cantrip Expansion (Spontaneous Caster).description: 君は自分の血脈が持つ基本的な力をよりよく理解する。呪文リストから追加でキャントリップを2つ、呪文のレパートリーに追加する。

Cantrip Expansion.name: Cantrip Expansion
Cantrip Expansion.description: You expand what your mind can accomplish. Add two additional occult cantrips to your repertoire.

Captivating Curiosity.name: Captivating Curiosity
Captivating Curiosity.description: You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enthrall] as a 3rd-level occult innate spell once per day.

Captivating Intensity.name: Captivating Intensity
Captivating Intensity.description: Your ability to captivate others has grown, and you can use your captivator abilities more often. You seem to never run out of the ability to fascinate or distract. You can cast each occult innate spell granted by captivator archetype feats one additional time per day. You can do this for spells of all levels granted, other than your two highest spell levels from non-cantrip captivator spells. If you have Heightened Captivation, you can Cast the chosen Spell a second time each day, though one of the two times you cast it, it's heightened two levels lower than your highest level of non-cantrip captivator spells, as long as the spell can be cast at that spell level.

Captivator Dedication.name: Captivator Dedication
Captivator Dedication.description:
Your ability to captivate others borders on the preternatural. You are seldom at a loss in social situations, and you can create minor enchantments or illusions. Choose Deception or Diplomacy. You become trained in that skill, or become an expert if you were already trained.

Choose two cantrips from the occult list; each cantrip must be from either the enchantment or illusion school. You gain access to the Cast a Spell activity and can cast these spells as occult innate spells. You're trained in occult spell attack rolls and spell DCs. If you have a hand free, you can usually replace material components with somatic components, so you don't need to use a spell component pouch. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.b7oePIMEMdFFS5TH]{Captivator} archetype.

Capture Magic.name: 魔法捕獲
Capture Magic.description:
トリガー 君が敵の危害を与える呪文に対するセーヴに成功した、もしくは敵が危害を与える呪文で生じた呪文攻撃ロールに失敗した。

君が呪文に抵抗する際、君はその魔法のいくらかを君が扱えるように捕獲する。君は秘術連鎖の構えに入る。秘術連鎖の追加ダメージを決定する際、トリガーとなった呪文を用いる。すでに君が秘術連鎖の構えに入っているなら、その代わりに君はその効果を一時的に増幅する。次の君のターンの終了時まで、君は秘術連鎖によるダメージに＋2のステータスボーナスを得る。

Caravan Leader.name: 行商牽引
Caravan Leader.description:
君は街道で味方に最高の力を発揮させる方法を知っている。探索モードで一行が“強行軍”する際、君のパーティは一人で最も長く“強行軍”できるメンバーと同じ時間＋20分まで“強行軍”できる。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JuqmIAnkL9hVGai8]

Careful Explorer.name: Careful Explorer
Careful Explorer.description: You've explored enough dusty tombs and hidden vaults to gain a sixth sense about traps, and you sometimes notice them even when you're not trying to. Even if you aren't Searching in exploration mode, you get a check to find traps that normally require you to Search for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to find the trap.

Cartwheel Dodge.name: Cartwheel Dodge
Cartwheel Dodge.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Encumbered] or overburdened.

Trigger You succeed or critically succeed at a Reflex saving throw.

You Step up to 10 feet.

Cascade Bearer's Flexibility.name: Cascade Bearer's Flexibility
Cascade Bearer's Flexibility.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You haven't yet acted on your turn.

You call upon your Cascade Bearer training to help you adjust a spell for the current situation. Until the end of your turn, you gain a single metamagic feat from the druid class or the wizard class that has a level requirement of no more than half your level.

Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting.name: Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting
Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting.description: Your Cascade Bearer training allows you to broaden the horizons of your halcyon spells further than most Magaambyans, weaving in spiritual magic. You can select halcyon spells from the divine or occult spell lists in additional to the arcane or primal spell lists, though they are still halcyon spells (so you choose when casting if they are arcane or primal spells). You gain a halcyon cantrip and a halcyon 1st-level spell.

Cascade Countermeasure.name: 連鎖による対応
Cascade Countermeasure.description: “秘術連鎖”の構えをとっている間、君は自分の魔法に対する抵抗力を生み出すことができる。君は@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rtisvvvhkpZPdgXc]{カスケード・カウンターメジャー}較差呪文を身につける。君の焦点化プールの焦点化ポイントを1増加する。

Cascading Ray.name: 連鎖の光線
Cascading Ray.description:
必要条件 君の最後のアクションが“呪文撃”の成功で、その時に君が発動した呪文はエネルギー・ダメージ（［音波］、［火炎］、［強酸］、［正のエネルギー］、［氷雪］、［負のエネルギー］、［雷撃］、［力場］のいずれか）である。

魔法のエネルギーは、君が攻撃したクリーチャーを超えて広がるようにこぼれ落ちる。流れるエネルギーは、ダメージを与えたクリーチャーから60フィートの範囲で光線を形成する。君の“呪文撃”でダメージを与えたクリーチャーを光線で攻撃することはできない。“打撃”と同じ複数回攻撃ペナルティを用いて、新しい目標のACに対して呪文攻撃ロールを行う。命中したなら、光線の目標は呪文レベル毎に1d4のその呪文と同じ種別のエネルギー・ダメージを受ける（クリティカル・ヒットでは2倍のダメージ）。君が呪文スロットから呪文を発動した場合、《連鎖の光線》のダメージは呪文レベル毎に1d8のダメージに増加する。

呪文が複数の種別のエネルギー・ダメージを与える場合、君は光線のダメージ種別に1つだけを選択する。この光線は、攻撃特性、元の呪文の系統と体系の特性、およびダメージ種別に対応する特性を持つ。

Cast Down.name: 打ち倒し発動
Cast Down.description: 君の信仰心の強さは敵を打ち倒すことができる。君が使用する次のアクションがクリーチャー1体にダメージを与えるために@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{ハーム}または@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{ヒール}を発動するために使用され、その呪文が目標にダメージを与えたなら、目標は倒れて伏せ状態となる。目標が呪文に対するセーヴに大失敗したなら、目標はさらに1分の間、移動速度に－10フィートのステータスペナルティを受ける。

prerequisites.value: 危害の泉もしくは治癒の泉

Cast Out.name: Cast Out
Cast Out.description: You attempt to cast a malevolent entity out of the creature or object it's possessing. Roll a counteract check against the possession effect; you must be within 30 feet of the possessed creature or object to do so. Your counteract level is half your level rounded up, and your counteract modifier is your Occultism modifier, Religion modifier, or spell DC - 10, whichever is highest. If you succeed, the entity is driven out and can't attempt to possess that creature or object for 1 week. If you fail, the possessing creature is immune to your Cast Out for a year and a day

Castigating Weapon.name: 叱責武器
Castigating Weapon.description: 神格の叱責の力は君の肉体を強化し、邪悪なものを打ち負かすことができる。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{ヒール}呪文を使用してフィーンドにダメージを与えた後、君の次のターンの終了時まで、君の武器もしくは素手打撃はその@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{ヒール}呪文のレベルの半分に等しい［善］ダメージを追加でフィーンドに与える。これは（holy runeによるものなどで）武器が既に与える［善］ダメージと累積する。

Cat Fall.name: 猫の如き着地
Cat Fall.description: 君は猫のように身軽に動き、落下を緩和する。落下は10フィート短いものとして扱う。君が〈軽業〉の熟練なら25フィート短いものとして扱う。〈軽業〉の達人なら50フィート短いものとして扱う。〈軽業〉の伝説なら落下の距離に関係なく常に足から着地し、ダメージを受けることはない。

Cat Nap.name: Cat Nap
Cat Nap.description:
You can briefly sleep to regain your energy quickly. Once per hour, by sleeping for 10 minutes, you can gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Cat Nap]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.l3S9i2UWGhSO58YX]

Catch the Details.name: Catch the Details
Catch the Details.description:
You are quick at recognizing broad details about people and things around you. You are trained in Society and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Eye For Numbers] skill feat. If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

Note: If you are already trained in the skill provided by this feat, you need to manually select an alternative skill.

Catchy Tune.name: Catchy Tune
Catchy Tune.description:
You create a tune so catchy, your foes can't help but dance along. Attempt a @Check[type:performance] check against the Will DCs of all enemies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30].

Critical Success The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard], both for 1 round.

Success The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Caterwaul.name: 猫あくび
Caterwaul.description:
頻度 1日1回

トリガー 30フィート以内にいる仲間のHPが0にまで減少したが、即座に死亡するわけではない。

君は逆境に直面したにも関わらず大胆不敵なあくびを行い、意識不明の瀬戸際から仲間を呼び戻す。

味方はノックアウトされず、ヒット・ポイントを1だけ残す。味方の重症状態値は、瀕死状態になってから回復したかのように1増加する。

Catfolk Dance.name: Catfolk Dance
Catfolk Dance.description:
You have a habit of always being in the way when other creatures attempt to move. Attempt an @Check[type:acrobatics|defense:reflex] check against an adjacent creature's Reflex DC.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Catfolk Dance]

Critical Success The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the start of your next turn.

Success The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.5bEnBqVOgdp4gROP]

Catfolk Lore.name: キャットフォークの知識
Catfolk Lore.description:
キャットフォークの中で育ったことで、君は旅の自由、土地の管理、好奇心が問題になったときの素早い反応といった伝統的な価値観を学ぶことができた。

君は〈軽業〉と〈生存〉に修得の習熟ランクを得る。これらの技能のいずれかを（来歴やクラスなどで）自動的に修得にする場合、代わりに君が選択した技能を修得にする。加えて、君は〈知識：キャットフォーク〉を修得にする。

Catfolk Weapon Expertise.name: キャットフォーク武器熟練
Catfolk Weapon Expertise.description: 君が特定の武器に熟練あるいはそれ以上の習熟度を与えるクラス特徴を得るたび、君は加えて《キャットフォーク武器精通》から修得を得たすべての武器にその習熟度を得る。

prerequisites.value: キャットフォーク武器精通

Catfolk Weapon Familiarity.name: キャットフォーク武器精通
